Class ScItemsLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Loader<D>

        • net.sitecore.android.sdk.api.model.ScItemsLoader

  • public class ScItemsLoader
extends android.content.AsyncTaskLoader<java.util.List<ScItem>>
    A loader that queries ScItemsProvider and returns List<ScItem>.
